general.01: Please stand at the marked line.
general.02: Please keep your mask in the store and sanitise your hands wherever it is possible.

congestion.00: Please do not stand in groups.
congestion.01: In case of inconvenience, please ask the staff.

sanitisation.01: Please use the placed hand sanitiser, where ever needed.
sanitisation.02: Please sanitise your hands before handling the doors.

toilet.00: There are many people in the toilet; please wait for a while before using it.

garbage.02: The garbage  used {usageS}, please sanitize the area

individual.00: The risk around your work location has been hig for {timeT}, please go and sanitise your hands/gloves/protective gear
individual.01: you have been working for {timeT} without break, please take a break

general.00: Total risk is highest today for the {weekW}

general.03: Overall risk is high today as compared to usual.
general.04: Totday was a good day in terms of store risk.

congestion.00: {areaA} area was most visited today, consider increasing the cleaning activity here
congestion.01: {areaA} area was crowded please consider rearranging items

sanitisation.00: Staffs in this area face higher risk, please rotate staff roles regulary.
sanitisation.01: Total hand was count today was very low.

general.00: 社会的距離を保ってください。

congestion.00: グループで立ってはいけません。
